content: Does anyone know where to get the HL7 v2 Interface Specification Document?

@Darnell Nance This sort of thing should probably go in the v2 thread.

I'm not 100% sure what you are looking for, but if you just want the v2 base standards they are are available from the standards grid. Check out http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_section.cfm?section=13 and see if what you want is there.
